heroSubtitle: Connecting global talent with seasonal opportunities. Fair wages, verified hosts, and transparent agreements in 50+ countries.
staysSubtitle: Furnished & unfurnished short-term rentals with a simple private agreement.
jobsSubtitle: Hospitality, mountain ops, retail & trades. Hire fast, work the season.
hpWhyTitle: Built on Trust. Backed by Transparency.
hpStorySnippet: Founded by travelers who experienced kindness in the mountains. We built Seasoners to create a platform where fair work, safe stays, and human connection thrive globally.
hpAgreementTeaserBody: Our verified, dual-language agreement template provides clarity and legal protection. Start every arrangement with confidence.
joinSeasonersCTA: Join Seasoners and start your seasonal adventure
aboutText1: Seasoners helps travelers and hosts connect for short-term stays and seasonal work.
aboutText2: We keep agreements simple and direct — helping you live and work around the world.
aboutDisclaimer: Nothing on this website is legal advice. Always review agreements under local law.
aboutMission: Seasoners connects people across borders to live, work, and grow together through meaningful cultural exchange. We believe accommodation should transcend transactions—creating opportunities for genuine human connection and mutual understanding.
founderQuote: you guys remind us of our own sons, and we want to help you out.
founderQuoteAttribution: An Austrian family — the moment Seasoners was born
aboutHumanConnection: This single act of generosity revealed what modern travel platforms have sacrificed: authentic human empathy and personal trust. That moment became our foundation—a commitment to relationships built on openness, respect, and shared humanity.
aboutWhyItMatters: In an era of algorithmic matching and impersonal transactions, we're rebuilding a bridge between travelers, hosts, and seasonal employers—one founded on transparency, fairness, and cultural respect. Every interaction on Seasoners is an opportunity to forge meaningful connections that transcend borders.
pillarConnectionBody: Every stay and job posting represents a relationship, not a reservation number. We prioritize genuine human interactions over transactional exchanges.
pillarFairnessBody: Plain-language agreements, clear expectations, and mutual respect replace hidden fees and opaque policies. Trust is built through transparency.
pillarCultureBody: We facilitate meaningful cross-cultural exchange by providing context, fostering curiosity, and celebrating diversity. Understanding bridges divides.
aboutInvitation: Join our community and share your seasonal journey. Help someone feel welcomed and understood in ways no algorithm can replicate.
subscribeSubtitle: Unlock premium features including unlimited listings, advanced messaging, and analytics. Try free for 90 days.
trialInfo: All plans include a 90-day free trial. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

agreementTemplate: Rental Agreement between [Tenant] and [Landlord] for [Address] from [Start] to [End]. Monthly rent €[Amount].
agreementPreamble: This agreement is designed to help travelers and hosts build trust from day one. It’s written in plain language so both parties know what’s expected — and what’s fair. By signing, both sides commit to clear communication, honesty, and respect throughout the stay.
clauseBasics: Address, dates, rent amount, included utilities, and any furnishings. Both parties confirm the space is suitable and respectfully maintained.
clauseCulture: Both parties agree to approach cultural differences with understanding and open communication. If something feels unclear or unusual, we talk first.
clauseMutualExit: If circumstances change, either party may end the stay early with respectful notice. Standard notice: [NoticeDays] days (or as required locally). Any prepaid amounts are reconciled fairly.
clausePayments: Rent due on [DueDay] each month via [Method]. Deposits, if any, are held for damages beyond normal wear. Provide receipts and return timely after checkout.
clauseHouseRules: Quiet hours, shared areas, guests, smoking, pets, and local registration if needed. Rules are reasonable, clear, and communicated before signing.
clauseDisputes: We resolve issues in good faith. Start with a conversation, then written notice. If needed, seek local mediation resources before legal steps.
countryNotes: Deposit limits, notice periods, and registration rules differ by country and city. Before signing, check local requirements and update placeholders like [NoticeDays], [DueDay], and [Method].
agreementPreambleEn: This agreement is designed to help travelers and hosts build trust from day one. It's written in plain language so both parties know what's expected — and what's fair. By signing, both sides commit to clear communication, honesty, and respect throughout the stay.
agreementPreambleDe: Diese Vereinbarung soll Reisenden und Gastgebern helfen, von Anfang an Vertrauen aufzubauen. Sie ist in einfacher Sprache verfasst, damit beide Parteien wissen, was erwartet wird – und was fair ist. Mit der Unterzeichnung verpflichten sich beide Seiten zu klarer Kommunikation, Ehrlichkeit und Respekt während des gesamten Aufenthalts.
clauseBasicsEn: Both parties confirm the rental address, stay dates, monthly rent amount, utilities included (electricity, water, internet), and furnishings provided. The tenant agrees to maintain the space respectfully and report any issues promptly. The host confirms the property is safe, habitable, and as described.
clauseBasicsDe: Beide Parteien bestätigen die Mietadresse, Aufenthaltsdaten, monatliche Miete, enthaltene Nebenkosten (Strom, Wasser, Internet) und bereitgestellte Möbel. Der Mieter verpflichtet sich, den Raum respektvoll zu pflegen und Probleme umgehend zu melden. Der Gastgeber bestätigt, dass die Immobilie sicher, bewohnbar und wie beschrieben ist.
clauseCultureEn: Both parties acknowledge cultural differences may exist in communication styles, household customs, and daily routines. We agree to approach misunderstandings with patience, ask clarifying questions before making assumptions, and prioritize respectful dialogue over judgment.
clauseCultureDe: Beide Parteien erkennen an, dass kulturelle Unterschiede in Kommunikationsstilen, Haushaltsgewohnheiten und Tagesabläufen bestehen können. Wir verpflichten uns, Missverständnisse mit Geduld anzugehen, klärende Fragen zu stellen, bevor Annahmen getroffen werden, und respektvollen Dialog über Urteile zu stellen.
clauseMutualExitEn: If unforeseen circumstances require ending the stay early, either party may terminate with written notice of [NoticeDays] days (or as required by local law, whichever is greater). The departing party provides clear reasoning. Any prepaid rent is reconciled fairly: unused rent is refunded proportionally, minus reasonable costs if applicable.
clauseMutualExitDe: Bei unvorhergesehenen Umständen kann jede Partei den Aufenthalt mit schriftlicher Mitteilung von [NoticeDays] Tagen beenden (oder wie gesetzlich vorgeschrieben, je nachdem, was länger ist). Die kündigende Partei gibt eine klare Begründung an. Vorausbezahlte Miete wird fair abgerechnet: Nicht genutzte Miete wird anteilig erstattet, abzüglich angemessener Kosten, falls zutreffend.
clausePaymentsEn: Monthly rent of €[Amount] is due on the [DueDay] of each month via [Method] (bank transfer, PayPal, etc.). Security deposits, if required, are held separately and returned within [DepositReturnDays] days after checkout, minus documented deductions for damages beyond normal wear. Both parties retain payment receipts and damage evidence.
clausePaymentsDe: Die monatliche Miete von €[Amount] ist am [DueDay] jeden Monats über [Method] (Banküberweisung, PayPal usw.) fällig. Kautionen werden, falls erforderlich, separat aufbewahrt und innerhalb von [DepositReturnDays] Tagen nach dem Auszug zurückerstattet, abzüglich dokumentierter Abzüge für Schäden über normale Abnutzung hinaus. Beide Parteien bewahren Zahlungsbelege und Schadensbeweise auf.
clauseHouseRulesEn: House rules include: quiet hours ([QuietStart]–[QuietEnd]), policies on guests/visitors, smoking restrictions, pet permissions, use of shared spaces (kitchen, laundry), and any local registration requirements (Anmeldung, empadronamiento, etc.). Rules must be reasonable, clearly communicated in writing before signing, and consistent with local tenant rights.
clauseHouseRulesDe: Hausordnung umfasst: Ruhezeiten ([QuietStart]–[QuietEnd]), Richtlinien zu Gästen/Besuchern, Rauchverbote, Haustiererlaubnis, Nutzung gemeinsamer Räume (Küche, Waschküche) und lokale Meldepflichten (Anmeldung, empadronamiento usw.). Regeln müssen angemessen, vor Unterzeichnung schriftlich kommuniziert und mit lokalen Mieterrechten vereinbar sein.
clauseDisputesEn: Disputes are resolved in good faith through: 1) Direct conversation to clarify the issue, 2) Written notice if unresolved, describing the problem and proposed solution, 3) Mediation through local tenant advocacy or community resources if necessary. Legal action is a last resort. Both parties agree to document communications and act with honesty and fairness.
clauseDisputesDe: Streitigkeiten werden in gutem Glauben gelöst durch: 1) Direktes Gespräch zur Klärung des Problems, 2) Schriftliche Mitteilung bei Nichtlösung mit Beschreibung des Problems und Lösungsvorschlag, 3) Mediation durch lokale Mieterberatung oder Gemeinschaftsressourcen bei Bedarf. Rechtliche Schritte sind letztes Mittel. Beide Parteien verpflichten sich, Kommunikation zu dokumentieren und ehrlich sowie fair zu handeln.
agreementTemplateEn: Rental Agreement: [Tenant Full Name] rents from [Landlord Full Name] the property at [Full Address] from [Start Date] to [End Date]. Monthly rent: €[Amount], due [DueDay] via [Payment Method]. Utilities included: [List]. Security deposit: €[Deposit] (if applicable). Notice period: [NoticeDays] days. Both parties agree to the Smart Stay Agreement clauses above.
agreementTemplateDe: Mietvertrag: [Vollständiger Name des Mieters] mietet von [Vollständiger Name des Vermieters] die Immobilie unter [Vollständige Adresse] vom [Startdatum] bis [Enddatum]. Monatliche Miete: €[Betrag], fällig am [Fälligkeitstag] über [Zahlungsmethode]. Enthaltene Nebenkosten: [Liste]. Kaution: €[Kaution] (falls zutreffend). Kündigungsfrist: [AnzahlTage] Tage. Beide Parteien stimmen den oben genannten Smart Stay Agreement-Klauseln zu.
countryNotesEn: Legal requirements vary by country and city. Germany: Max 3 months rent deposit, Anmeldung required. Austria: Deposits regulated, registration mandatory. Spain: Empadronamiento may be needed. France: Notice periods protected by law. Always verify local tenant rights, deposit limits ([MaxDeposit] months rent), mandatory registration, and minimum notice periods ([MinNoticeDays] days) before signing. Update placeholders to reflect local law.
countryNotesDe: Rechtliche Anforderungen variieren je nach Land und Stadt. Deutschland: Max. 3 Monatsmieten Kaution, Anmeldung erforderlich. Österreich: Kautionen reguliert, Anmeldung verpflichtend. Spanien: Empadronamiento möglicherweise erforderlich. Frankreich: Kündigungsfristen gesetzlich geschützt. Überprüfen Sie immer lokale Mieterrechte, Kautionsgrenzen ([MaxKaution] Monatsmieten), Meldepflicht und Mindestkündigungsfristen ([MinKündigungstage] Tage) vor Unterzeichnung. Platzhalter an lokales Recht anpassen.
trustedStayGuideDesc: Short explanations of local norms, deposits, notice periods and staff housing expectations will live here. This section will help you understand what to expect when renting in {zone} and ensure you're prepared for local rental customs and requirements.
howToFindJob: How to find a job in {zone}
comingSoonJobTips: Coming soon: Tips and strategies for landing seasonal work
comingSoonStaffHousing: Coming soon: Best hostels and accommodations offering staff housing
